dict.acceptation: 成一行的，纵长的；沿着，循着；一块儿；上前；

sent.orig: How do you get along with others?I get along with others very well.
Along the underside of their arms are grooves, along these arranged little tube like sucker feet.
sent.trans: 沿着手臂内侧长有一些凹槽，里面长有吸管状的吸足。

sent.orig: After Katrina, investigators concluded that the levees along the along MRGO straight into the city.
sent.trans: 在卡特里娜飓风过后，调查人员发现沿河大堤未能挡住洪水顺着MRGO（密西西比河的河湾出口）一直涌入城市。

sent.orig: The thick smell of feces corrupted the air along with the rusted metal along the sink.
sent.trans: 大便浓重的臭味弥漫在空气中，混杂着水池里锈坏金属的味道。

sent.orig: If necessary, pull a strand of yarn along the crosswise grain, and cut along this yarn.
sent.trans: 如有必要，可沿横丝绺抽出一根纱线，再沿着这条线将面料剪开。
